body_html: As a general question, what is the difference between TensorTypeId and TypeId, other than the fact that one is flat-registered? It seems that the APIs for TensorTypeId and TypeId are much different, and I wonder if we want to make them consistent (to avoid overloading newcomer learning).

body: As a general question, what is the difference between TensorTypeId and TypeId, other than the fact that one is flat-registered? It seems that the APIs for TensorTypeId and TypeId are much different, and I wonder if we want to make them consistent (to avoid overloading newcomer learning).
